Trade/Device Name(s): TrueDX hCG Early Result Pregnancy Test (Midstream Format)
TrueDX hCG Early Result Pregnancy Test (Cassette Format)
VeriClear Early Result Pregnancy Test (Midstream Format)
VeriClear Early Result Pregnancy Test (Cassette Format)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TrueDX and VeriClear Early Result Pregnancy Tests for qualitative detection of hCG in urine using chromatographic immunoassay
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid qualitative detection of human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) in urine as an aid in early detection of pregnancy, as early as five days before the expected period
